abstract: Verlyn Klinkenborg Editorial Appreciation of Elouise Cobell, Blackfeet Tribe member who has died; Cobell successfully sued the Interior Department in 1996 for share of revenues the government had earned from the lands held in trust.
snippet: Elouise Cobell, a member of the Blackfeet Tribe, made a different future possible for American Indians with her tenacious advocacy.
lead_paragraph: Elouise Cobell, a member of the Blackfeet Tribe, made a different future possible for American Indians with her tenacious advocacy.
